official_title: A joint resolution to authorize a study of surveys to prevent flooding along the Fork Branch Creek.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army and the Secretary of Agriculture to make investigations and surveys with respect to the prevention of flooding along the South Fork and Flat Branch sub-basins of the Sangamon River Basin.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize a study of surveys to prevent flooding along the Fork Branch Creek.
